list.title: Api.configure
list.description: Calls all configuration functions in order.

list.title: Api.configureAuthentication
list.description: Configures authentication middleware generally used with the router.

list.title: Api.configureHelpers
list.description: Configures the helper that is passed to the Koa Router context.

list.title: Database.defineModels
list.description: Make model functions accessible as property of model.

list.title: Database.initAccount
list.description: Runs data population and migration operations.

list.title: Helper.createFileList
list.description: Create an array of absolute file paths.

list.title: Helper.defaultExpireRefresh
list.description: Default refresh token validity period in minutes.

list.title: Helper.defaultExpireToken
list.description: Default token validity period in minutes.

list.title: Helper.flattenObject
list.description: Reduce an object to only one level of keys

list.title: Helper.gaurdedCondition
list.description: Format a database query condition object for safe usage if required.

list.title: Helper.generateConfig
list.description:
Set config object for a part of the app,
populating it with default values where absent.

list.title: Helper.getAbsolutePath
list.description: Get absolute path of file reletive to this file.

list.title: Helper.getMatchSymbol
list.description: Get the match Symbol for the passed string value.

list.title: Helper.hasAllKeys
list.description: Compare two objects to determine if both have the same keys.

list.title: Helper.isJsonArrayFile
list.description:
Opens a JSON file and reads a number of bytes to determine
if the JSON data is an array.

list.title: Helper.isSameHashed
list.description: Determine whether one string is equal to another when hashed

list.title: Helper.middlewareHandler
list.description: Sets KoaRouter middleware or controller response

list.title: Helper.mkdir
list.description:
Creates a directory recursively, creating
parent directories if they do not exist

list.title: Helper.peekIntoFile
list.description: Opens a file and reads a number of bytes

list.title: Helper.readJsonFile
list.description: Opens a JSON file and parses string to JS

list.title: Helper.replaceInObject
list.description: Replace a key or value within an object

list.title: Helper.sequelizeOpKeys
list.description: Replace a mongoose operator with sequelize operator

list.title: Helper.setConfig
list.description: Set config object for the different parts of the app.

list.title: Helper.testDatabase
list.description: Test a certain database operation with a certain payload to match a predetermined output.

list.title: Helper.testRoute
list.description: Test an http method with a certain payload to match a predetermined output.

list.title: Helper.toCamelcase
list.description: Convert a string to camel case

list.title: MongoDatabase.findById
list.description: Find one document by its Id.

list.title: MongoDatabase.init
list.description: Configure, build models and intialise connection.

list.title: MongoDatabase.setSelectOptions
list.description: Populate a virtual or ref field.

list.title: SQLiteDatabase.findById
list.description: Find one row by its Id.

list.title: SQLiteDatabase.init
list.description: Configure, build models and intialise connection.

list.title: module:authentication~getAuthenticatedUser
list.description: Checks whether JWT token is valid and returns the decrypted user object.

list.title: module:authentication~isAuthenticated
list.description: Checks whether JWT token is valid.

list.title: module:authentication~responseTemplate
list.description: Default template used for authentication response.

list.title: module:loadSchemas
list.description: Facilitates the loading of a database model.

list.title: module:loadSchemas~loadSchemas
list.description: Load config file and build database models.

list.title: module:model/mongodb
list.description: Interprets config data to construct a database model.

list.title: module:model/mongodb
list.description: Load config file and build a database model.

list.title: module:model/mongodb~arrayType
list.description: Evaluates JS array type to determine Database Array type.

list.title: module:model/mongodb~evalDataType
list.description: Evaluates JS data type to determine Database data type.

list.title: module:model/mongodb~getType
list.description: Evaluates string to determine Database data type.

list.title: module:model/mongodb~setDataType
list.description: Iterates over JS datatypes to find database data types.

list.title: module:model/sqlite
list.description: Interprets config data to construct a database model.

list.title: module:model/sqlite
list.description: Load config file and build a database model.

list.title: module:model/sqlite~arrayType
list.description: Evaluates JS array type to determine Database Array type.

list.title: module:model/sqlite~evalDataType
list.description: Evaluates JS data type to determine Database data type.

list.title: module:model/sqlite~getType
list.description: Evaluates string to determine Database data type.

list.title: module:model/sqlite~setDataType
list.description: Iterates over JS datatypes to find database data types.

list.title: module:route/builder
list.description: Facilitates the loading of api routes.

list.title: module:route/builder~createConfigList
list.description: Opens and reads in JSON config file.

list.title: module:route/builder~getMiddleware
list.description: Opens and reads in JSON config file.

list.title: module:route/builder~routeBuilder
list.description: Find, load and build routes from config files.
